1.08.text:

challenge.

or you might save that for another day.

1749.98.text:
Massaging the spine sweetly, back and forth
we go.

1756.95.text:
And then when you feel satisfied, go ahead
and come onto your back.

1760.25.text: Hug the knees into the chest.

1761.76.text: Give yourself a nice big hug.

1763.19.text:
You rock a little gently side to side, if
it feels good.

1768.41.text:
Then slowly release the soles of the feet
to the ground.

1772.12.text:
I got to do this embarrassing inchworm to
the center of my mat.

1779.01.text: And I'm going to extend the right leg up high.

1780.99.text:
Reclined one-leg pigeon here, crossing right
ankle over left thigh, interlace the fingertips

1787.11.text:
behind your left thigh and squeeze those legs
up towards your heart.

1804.56.text:
Crossing the left ankle over the right thigh,
same thing on this side.

1807.96.text:
Pay attention to how you feel, stay present
in the sensations.

1815.89.text: Man, a little really goes a long way.

1823.38.text:
I'm feeling it in my body like; "Oh yeah,
I needed this."

1831.65.text: Once again, hugging the knees up.

1834.10.text:
Ending with a little Texas-T here, we send
the fingertips left to right.

1840.76.text: Exhale, melt the knees to one side.

1846.26.text:
And exhale onto my mic pack, to the opposite
side.

1852.31.text:
And then it's all you baby, back and forth
here.

1854.21.text: Try to keep your shoulders on the ground.

1856.30.text:
And we just stabilize and work it out, twisting
back and forth, back and forth.

1863.65.text:
And then when you feel satisfied, take your
time, but when you feel satisfied come back

1869.24.text:
Soles of the feet hit the mat with a bit of
a thud, just a little reflexology here.

1875.94.text: You can do it a couple more times.

1877.75.text: And then slowly sliding the legs down.

1885.85.text:
Inhale, reaching the arms up and overhead,
full body stretch.

1893.09.text: And exhale, lots of love out.

1899.51.text:
If there's anything else you'd like to fulfill
in your body, do that now, practice.

1905.38.text:
Otherwise, we're going to guide the body towards
Shavasana.

1911.39.text:
Taking a moment of gratitude for this time
on our mat.

1921.59.text: Return your breath back to its natural rhythm.

1926.62.text: And enjoy this moment of rest.
